archimate:Requirement.name: AS.1.1.11: The main findings from the security assurance review should be reported to relevant stakeholders, in an appropriate style and format, presenting the level of assurance over the security of the target environment, based on reporting about the:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
